item.title: yodaimperium.de
item.description: In this article I’m going to explain the underlying architecture of this website. I think I found a very cool way to deploy just by pushing to the GitHub Repository without exposing any SSH keys, etc.. However, I took a lot of inspiration from this guy called Wolfgang’s Channel on YouTube. TL;DR It is created with Hugo and deployed via GitHub Actions to a RaspberryPi running nginx. Static Website Generation This very website is created with Hugo and the Gokarna Theme.
